skills.name: Thorns of the Abyss
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower
skills.desc: After using his Skill, Luocha immediately restores the target ally's HP equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Luocha's ATK plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color>. Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.\nWhen any ally's HP percentage drops to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> or lower, an effect equivalent to Luocha's Skill will immediately be triggered and applied to this ally for one time (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered again after <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skills.name: Death Wish
skills.desc: Removes <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> <u>buff(s)</u> from all enemies and deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Luocha's ATK to all enemies. Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

skills.name: Cycle of Life
skills.desc: When Abyss Flower reaches <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks of Abyss Flower to deploy a Field against the enemy.\nWhen any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is immediately restored by an amount equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color> of Luocha's ATK plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak></color>.\nThe Field's effect lasts for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turns. When Luocha is knocked down, the Field will be dispelled.

skills.name: Mercy of a Fool
skills.desc: After the Technique is used, the Talent will be immediately triggered at the start of the next battle.

eidolons.name: Ablution of the Quick
eidolons.desc: While the Field is active, ATK of all allies increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Bestowal From the Pure
eidolons.desc: When his Skill is triggered, if the target ally's HP is lower than <unbreak>50%</unbreak>, Luocha's Outgoing Healing increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. If the target ally's HP is at <unbreak>50%</unbreak> or higher, the ally receives a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Luocha's ATK plus <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turns.

eidolons.name: Surveyal by the Fool
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Heavy Lies the Crown
eidolons.desc: When Luocha's Field is active, enemies become Weakened and deal <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> less DMG.

eidolons.name: Cicatrix 'Neath the Pain
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Reunion With the Dust
eidolons.desc: When Ultimate is used, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> fixed chance to reduce all enemies' All-Type RES by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skillTree.name: Cleansing Revival
skillTree.desc: When the Skill's effect is triggered, removes <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> debuff(s) from a target ally.

skillTree.name: Sanctified
skillTree.desc: When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, all allies (except the attacker) restore HP equal to <unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak> of Luocha's ATK plus <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Through the Valley
skillTree.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
